Robot Hat¶

Introduction¶

Using robot hat without installing the ezblock image, without using the ezblock library, api

Installation¶

git clone https://github.com/sunfounder/robot-hat.git
cd robot-hat
sudo python3 setup.py install

Contents:

  • class ADC - analog to digital converter
  • class I2C - IIC bus
  • class Music - notes and beats
  • class Pin - control I/O pins

  • class Serial_Sound - serial sound player

    • class ADXL345 - accelemeter

    • class DS18X20 - ds18x20 series temperature sensor
    • class Joystick - 3-axis joystick

    • class Ultrasonic - ultrasonic ranging sensor
  • Servo
    • Quick reference for the Serial Servo
